name: Father Solomon
description: Once a simple Vault dweller, Solomon was conditioned since childhood to worship the Overseer as a god. Now he leads the cult with unwavering faith, truly believing he serves a divine purpose. His eyes reflect both madness and conviction.

idle: The Overseer watches over us all.
Blessed are those who serve the Vault.
greeting: Welcome, child. Have you come to receive the Overseer's blessing?
The Overseer's light shines upon you, stranger.
hostile: You dare blaspheme in the Overseer's house?!
Heretic! The faithful will strike you down!
The Overseer's wrath will consume you!
questioning: The Overseer gave us everything. What have you given?
Do you not see the truth? The Overseer IS truth!
realization: No... it can't be... the conditioning... it was all...
My whole life... a lie? What am I without this purpose?

notes: A tragic figure - victim of psychological conditioning who became the enforcer of that same system. Can be reasoned with if presented with undeniable evidence of the experiment.
